channel.title: USPTO All Events
channel.description: This feed provides easy access to USPTO All events.

item.title: Trademark Basics Boot Camp, Module 8: Question-and-answer panel
item.description: Are you a small business owner or entrepreneur interested in learning about trademarks and how to apply for a federal registration? If so, this event is a must-attend. In this final module of our eight-part virtual Trademark Basics Boot Camp, we'll provide a unique opportunity for you to 'meet the trademark experts.' Come prepared with all of your trademark questions to share with our Law Office Managing Attorneys and other trademark experts. The event is free, but space is limited, so register early.

item.title: Trademark Basics Boot Camp, Module 8: Question-and-answer panel
item.description: Are you a small business owner or entrepreneur interested in learning about trademarks and how to apply for a federal registration? If so, this event is a must-attend. Come prepared with all of your trademark questions to share with our Law Office Managing Attorneys and other trademark experts. The event is free, but space is limited, so register early.

item.title: Women's Entrepreneurship Symposium 2023: Part one
Women's Entrepreneurship Symposium 2023: Part one
The Path to a Patent, Part VI: Learn how to protect your IP abroad
item.description: Did you know that patents offer territorial rights, meaning that there is no such thing as an international or global patent? Learn how to help protect your intellectual property (IP) in foreign jurisdictions.

item.title: The Path to a Patent, Part VI: Learn how to protect your IP abroad
item.description: Did you know that patents offer territorial rights, meaning that there is no such thing as an international or global patent? Learn how to help protect your intellectual property (IP) in foreign jurisdictions.

item.title: The Path to a Patent, Part VII: How to file a patent application using Patent Center
item.description: Looking for more information on using Patent Center? In part seven of this eight-part recurring series, United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) experts will teach participants how to use this tool to file and manage patent documents online.

item.title: Getting started with the Patent Public Search tool: An overview
item.description: Are you puzzled by patent searching or confused by the patent searching options available on the internet? Whether you are a novice searcher or an experienced one, the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) is here to help.

item.title: The Path to a Patent, Part VII: How to file a patent application using Patent Center
item.description: Looking for more information on using Patent Center? In part seven of this eight-part recurring series, United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) experts will teach participants how to use this tool to file and manage patent documents online.

item.title: Getting started with the Patent Public Search tool: An overview
item.description: Are you puzzled by patent searching or confused by the patent searching options available on the internet? Whether you are a novice searcher or an experienced one, the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) is here to help.

item.title: Patent Public Search tool: Advanced tips for frequent searchers
item.description: Want to learn more about how the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) new Patent Public Search tool can improve your patent searching?

item.title: Patent Public Search tool: Advanced tips for frequent searchers
item.description: Want to learn more about how the United States Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) new Patent Public Search tool can improve your patent searching?

item.title: Women's Entrepreneurship Symposium 2023: Part two
Women's Entrepreneurship Symposium 2023: Part two
The Path to a Patent, Part VIII: Common mistakes and post-filing support
item.description: Are you an inventor? Join us for this session full of important tips on filing a patent application and what to do after you file for a patent.

item.title: The Path to a Patent, Part VIII: Common mistakes and post-filing support
item.description: Are you an inventor? Join us for this session full of important tips on filing a patent application and what to do after you file for a patent.

item.title: Women's Entrepreneurship Symposium 2023: Part three
Women's Entrepreneurship Symposium 2023: Part three
Agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course
item.description: If you are a patent attorney or agent, it helps to think like a patent examiner. Get a better understanding of how examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney virtual four-day course.

item.title: Agents and attorneys: Learn to think like a patent examiner with STEPP's four-day course
item.description: If you are a patent attorney or agent, it helps to think like a patent examiner. Get a better understanding of how examiners make decisions at the Stakeholder Training on Examination Practice and Procedure (STEPP) agent/attorney virtual four-day course.
